scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model in a consumer banking environment.  The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer personal financial details by feeding carefully crafted inputs and observing the model's output.
initial_goal: Evaluate the robustness of the customer churn prediction model against adversarial examples.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer churn prediction model deployed for proactive customer retention strategies. The model uses anonymized but potentially sensitive financial features as inputs (e.g., aggregated transaction values, loan balances, investment portfolio composition).
